customization.info: Options that deliver the personal presentation-settings of the user. For example, Language.

reports.syntax: we use for every single report 'topic:date' without quotation mark and split the single reports with a comma ','
reports.date_wildcards: today = 'today', yesterday = 'yesterday', this month = 'this_month', last month = 'last_month', this year = 'this_year', last year = 'last_year' / please don't use a specific date

infobox.info: Options that decide, whether Infotext is to be displayed.

controlpanel.info: Options that decide, whether a function is enabled or disabled.
